constraints.name: degree_upper_bound
constraints.description: 每个节点的度数不超过 2

constraints.name: bipartite_graph
constraints.description: 图是二分图，顶点分为两部分，每部分有 n 个顶点

constraints.name: subgraph_definition
constraints.description: 子图 G'(l, r, L, R) 由原图中属于区间 [l, r] 和 [L, R] 的顶点及其边组成
constraints.formal: G'(l, r, L, R) = (V', E') where V' = {v | l ≤ v ≤ r or L ≤ v ≤ R} and E' = {e | e ∈ E and both endpoints of e are in V'}

constraints.name: tuple_range
constraints.description: 四元组 (l, r, L, R) 满足 1 ≤ l ≤ r ≤ n 和 n+1 ≤ L ≤ R ≤ 2n
